label: User Interface Satisfaction
summary: Users appreciate the app's clean and user-friendly interface, making it easy for beginners.
high_signal_quotes: Very simple & user friendly!: Love it! Very simple & user friendly!
Super App: Easy, intuitive and excellent UI.
Great app for investing!: Groww has a very clean and easy-to-use interface.
action_ideas: Conduct user testing to identify UI pain points.
Implement a dark mode option for better accessibility.
Add tooltips for first-time users to guide them.

label: Investment Features
summary: Users are looking for more investment features and tools to enhance their experience.
high_signal_quotes: New feature request: Bring XIRR for stocks as well.
Should give summary of daily or weekly MF performance as alert.
The best part is, its simplicity both in use and its analysis.
action_ideas: Develop a feature to track XIRR for stocks.
Create a performance summary alert for mutual funds.
Introduce educational content on investment strategies within the app.

label: Transaction Efficiency
summary: Users highlight the speed and efficiency of transactions, which enhances their investment experience.
high_signal_quotes: The ease of transaction is wonderful.
Investing in mutual funds and stocks is smooth.
action_ideas: Optimize transaction processing time for faster execution.
Enhance alert system for real-time transaction updates.
Implement a one-click transaction feature for repeat investments.

label: Trust and Reliability
summary: Users express trust in the app for safe investments and reliable service.
high_signal_quotes: It is very Safe to Invest and Trade in Groww.
Good app for stock and investment app.
Dependable Trade: very Professional and Integrity.
action_ideas: Enhance security features to boost user trust.
Publish regular transparency reports on app performance.
Create a user testimonial section to build community trust.

label: Performance Reporting Issues
summary: Some users report issues with performance reporting and data accuracy.
high_signal_quotes: It doesn’t give a proper PnL and nor any proper statement.
Showing issue in index bar where in not showing properly nifty bank nifty status.
action_ideas: Fix bugs related to PnL reporting and statements.
Improve the accuracy of index bar data display.
Add a feedback mechanism for users to report data issues.
